mapper.select: select * from(select todo_no as no, todo_title as title, todo_writer as writer, todo_day as day, todo_status as status, todo_text as text, todo_created_date as createdDate, todo_completed_date as completedDate, todo_deleted_date as deletedDate from sample_todos order by todo_no desc) where rownum <= 5

select todo_no as no, todo_title as title, todo_writer as writer, todo_day as day, todo_status as status, todo_text as text, todo_created_date as createdDate, todo_completed_date as completedDate, todo_deleted_date as deletedDate from sample_todos where todo_writer = #{value} order by todo_no desc

select todo_no as no, todo_title as title, todo_writer as writer, todo_day as day, todo_status as status, todo_text as text, todo_created_date as createdDate, todo_completed_date as completedDate, todo_deleted_date as deletedDate from sample_todos where todo_no = #{value}
mapper.update: update sample_todos set todo_title = #{title}, todo_day = #{day}, todo_status = #{status}, todo_text = #{text}, todo_completed_date = #{completedDate}, todo_deleted_date = #{deletedDate} where todo_no = #{no}
